DOC.brief_title: Implementation Ischemic Heart Disease Clinical Practice Guidelines
DOC.detailed_description: Background : The purpose study design evaluate target implementation strategy fully integrate VHA clinical practice guideline ischemic heart disease VHA clinical practice . Effectively implement guideline enhance quality , appropriateness , timeliness , cost effectiveness care deliver veteran ischemic heart disease . Objectives : The long-term objective study identify best strategy implement IHD guideline improve guideline adherence provider acceptance . The specific objective study : 1 ) describe temporal aspect guideline acceptance adherence three period time : pre-implementation , post-implementation general strategy , post- implementation target strategy ; 2 ) ass relative effectiveness target intervention strategy guideline adherence ; 3 ) identify relationship among provider belief , attitude , intention use guideline ; 4 ) identify cost associate implementation general target implementation strategy ; 5 ) describe provider satisfaction target implementation strategy . Methods : Qualitative ( focus group , interview key informant ) quantitative method ( survey , chart review ) use address study objective . A survey send provider measure beliefs attitude predict provider acceptance clinical practice guideline . Patient level data collect review chart facility . Based provider focus group design target strategy overcome system barrier address need identified provider support clinical practice guideline implementation . A randomized trial conduct assess relative effectiveness target intervention strategy . Status : Data collection end .
